Changes of jar-install-plugin Project

Release-Geschichte

VersionDatumBeschreibung
0.2-SNAPSHOT21.01.2012Begin development via maven3 api.
0.120.01.2012Branch 0.1 splitted
0.1-SNAPSHOT16.01.2010Development of the main function.

Release 0.2-SNAPSHOT - 21.01.2012

TypÄnderungenDurch

Begin development of new version. Port to maven3 api.tmichel

Move the build to hudson build of cloudbees via maven.tmichel

Move the project web site to github for easy deployment via github-maven-plugins. At sourceforge the maven deployment is a war against the security of the portal. I spend a lot of time to resolve the propblem in the latest years. But now i give up.tmichel

Reduce the maven settings.xml to one profile which is always active to support secret properties. At hudson this should be done by environment variables.tmichel

Release 0.1 - 20.01.2012

TypÄnderungenDurch

Version 0.1 branched for bugfixing later.tmichel

Release 0.1-SNAPSHOT - 16.01.2010

TypÄnderungenDurch

First implementation of jar-install-plugin via maven2 plugin api.tmichel
